text: sources address the diagnosis or management of cri-du-chat syndrome:  - Cri du Chat Syndrome Support Group (UK): Diagnosis  - Cri du Chat Syndrome Support Group (UK): Therapies  - Genetic Testing Registry: 5p partial monosomy syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Cri du Chat Syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palli
